About Me

I'm Sakshi Kadu, a Computer Science and Engineering student at YCCE, Nagpur, graduating in 2027. Iâ€™m passionate about crafting meaningful digital experiences through clean code and thoughtful design.

My journey started with simple HTML pages and grew into full-fledged projects using JavaScript, React, Bootstrap, and GSAP. I enjoy bringing ideas to life through responsive and interactive interfaces. I love working with React

I recently completed a virtual internship with{" "} Deloitte Australia through Forage, where I explored real-world business scenarios in the technology domain. During the program, I worked on proposing a dashboard solution for a client, practiced development planning, and understood how tech consulting functions in a corporate setting.

I also gained hands-on experience as a Web Developer Intern at{" "} CodSoft, where I built live projects like a weather app using public APIs and a Chrome extension for productivity tracking. These experiences helped me strengthen my frontend skills and understand the importance of clean UI, reusability, and performance.

I actively explore Data Structures & Algorithms to strengthen my problem-solving skills. For me, code is not just syntax â€” itâ€™s a tool to think, debug, and innovate.

I'm constantly learning, improving, and building â€” not to know everything, but to keep growing every day.
